#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define REP(i,n) for(ll i = 0 ; i < (ll) ( n ) ; i ++)
#define setminus1(a)  memset(a,-1,sizeof(a))
#define set0(a)  memset(a,0,sizeof(a))
#define setinf(a)  memset(a,127,sizeof(a))
#define pb  push_back
#define mp  make_pair
#define EPS  1e-9
#define INF  1e9

typedef long long int ll;
typedef vector<int> vi;
typedef pair<int,int> ii;
typedef vector<ii> vii;

#define MAX_N 505


void solve(){

	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		string s1;
		string s2;
		cin>>s1>>s2;
		if(s2.length()+1 != s1.length()){
			cout<<"0\n";
		}else{
			int j = 0, i =0;
			int fg = 1;
			for(i = 0;i <(int) s2.length();){
				if(s2[i] == s1[j]){
					j++;
					i++;
				}else{
					j++;
					if(j-i > 1){
						fg = 0;

					break;
					}
				}
			}
			cout<<fg<<endl;
		}
	}

}
int main(){
	solve();
	return 0 ;
}
